code:
local varType = type(buff_name) -- luacheck: ignore
local aura = false
if varType == "string" then
    aura = C_UnitAuras.GetAuraDataBySpellName("player", buff_name , "HELPFUL|PLAYER")  -- luacheck: ignore
elseif varType == "number" then
    aura = C_UnitAuras.GetPlayerAuraBySpellID(buff_name)  -- luacheck: ignore
end

if aura then
    return true
end
return false
